name: @hexabot/monorepo
description: Hexabot is a solution for creating and managing chatbots across multiple channels, leveraging AI for advanced conversational capabilities. It provides a user-friendly interface for building, training, and deploying chatbots with integrated support for various messaging platforms.
author: Hexastack

scripts.release:patch: pnpm run release:api:patch && pnpm --filter "@hexabot/frontend" version patch --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false && pnpm --filter "@hexabot/widget" version patch --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false
scripts.release:minor: pnpm run release:api:minor && pnpm --filter "@hexabot/frontend" version minor --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false && pnpm --filter "@hexabot/widget" version minor --git-tag-version false --commit-hooks false
